drupalNodeEvent.title: The EU's struggle to come to terms with US-China great power competition

field_organizers.processed: University of Glasgow - Scottish Centre for China Research

field_description.processed: This talk will explore the extent of - and reasons behind - the shift in perceptions of China among EU policymakers, the key challenges in the EU-China relationship at present, and the struggle within the EU to forge a coherent strategy in the face of growing US-China rivalry.
